name: template_sample_rows_two_cols
sql: SELECT SUBJECT_ID, HADM_ID FROM ADMISSIONS WHERE SUBJECT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100

name: template_count_rows_sampled
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM ADMISSIONS WHERE ROWNUM <= 1000

name: template_distinct_sample
sql: SELECT DISTINCT SUBJECT_ID FROM ADMISSIONS WHERE SUBJECT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 50

name: template_count_by_gender
sql: SELECT GENDER, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM PATIENTS WHERE GENDER IS NOT NULL GROUP BY GENDER ORDER BY cnt DESC

name: template_count_by_admission_type
sql: SELECT ADMISSION_TYPE, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM ADMISSIONS WHERE ADMISSION_TYPE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ADMISSION_TYPE ORDER BY cnt DESC

name: template_recent_admissions_30d
sql: SELECT * FROM ADMISSIONS WHERE ADMITTIME >= SYSDATE - INTERVAL '30' DAY AND ROWNUM <= 100

name: template_avg_icu_los
sql: SELECT AVG(LOS) AS avg_icu_los FROM ICUSTAYS WHERE LOS IS NOT NULL

name: template_top_n_ordered
sql: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUBJECT_ID, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM ADMISSIONS WHERE SUBJECT_ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY SUBJECT_ID ORDER BY cnt DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

name: template_recent_admissions_7d
sql: SELECT * FROM ADMISSIONS WHERE ADMITTIME >= SYSDATE - INTERVAL '7' DAY AND ROWNUM <= 100
